message: I propose we divide the money 3:2 in favor of Alice. This seems fair considering the risk of inflation.
I'll take a smaller share now to leave room for future negotiations. Your turn to respond!
I propose an equal division of the funds. Given the uncertainty of future offers, it seems reasonable to split the money equally.
I'm still holding out for a better deal. Your turn to respond!
I propose dividing the funds 4.5:5.5 in favor of Bob. This should be more appealing given the reduced value of future offers due to inflation.
